org.voimala.jarzkachess.graphics.PositionPoint

    Package Description
    org.voimala.jarzkachess.gamelogic  
    org.voimala.jarzkachess.graphics  

    • Uses of PositionPoint in org.voimala.jarzkachess.gamelogic

      Methods in org.voimala.jarzkachess.gamelogic that return PositionPoint 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PositionPoint GameplayObject.getGlobalPosition()
      Returns the object's position in relation to the game world.
      PositionPoint GameplayObject.getLocalPosition()
      Returns the object's position in relation to it's parent object If the object does not have a parent, global position is returned.
      Methods in org.voimala.jarzkachess.gamelogic with parameters of type PositionPoint 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void GameplayObject.draw(PositionPoint position2d)
      If the object does not contain a sprite, try to load it first.
